data.name: Star Story: The Horizon Escape Demo
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

If you really liked demo, please check out the FULL version.


About the Game

The archaeological research mission faced some unexpected difficulties. Your spaceship crashed. Can you escape from this planet? But how? No one can help you. You are here all alone. Or not? Do you have a plan? Will you find what it takes to be a hero?

Meet Star Story: The Horizon Escape - a turn-based adventure game with text-rpg elements. Tune into the story of the aspiring space-archaeologist Van Klik on his mission to the mysterious planet of Horizon!



  • Text-based gameplay diversity

    The core classic. Dive into the stories and find a way to exploit EVERY possible situation.

  • Non-linear plot development, 24 alternative endings

    Your choices define the story. Totaly.

  • Game mechanics

    A mix of dialogues, choices, turn-based battles, puzzles, crafting and technology researches.

  • Turn-based philosophy

    Everything is turn-based. No time-limit for making decisions, no quick-time events, no rush: you decide on the speed you want to play.

  • Beautiful world and colorful characters

    Enjoy the wild and crazy sceneries of the world of Horizon and meet the locals! Deserts with shrimps, bandidos at jungles, alian girls at alien cities…



Who is more to your liking? Make your turn and let's see how can you survive the challenging world of Horizon.

Need A break? The Horizon Is Waiting!

P.S. Space shrimps are included...

data.short_description: Turn-based adventure game with text-rpg elements. You have your own spaceship, holographic personal assistant and a mission to the mysterious planet of Horizon! What can go wrong? Everything!
data.reviews:
“Star Story is great already, alongside the promise to get even better.”
8/10 – The Overpowered Noobs

“I give 8, but potentially it is 10 - unique elements of a gameplay, reminds of old text quests and it is drawn very perfectly!”
8/10 – Zaltir's Channel

“This game is kind of like an RPG with some very cool art”
SplatterCatGaming' Cannel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+ Dual Core Processor or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+ Dual Core Processor or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
